reporting-org.narrative: The federal government of the United States

description.narrative: Support the science and practice of food, feed, and fiber production (including forestry, wildlife, fisheries, aquaculture and floriculture) and its relationships to natural resources, processing, marketing, distribution, utilization (including nutrition), and trade.

This award strives to support the science and practice of food, feed, and fiber production (including forestry, wildlife, fisheries, aquaculture and floriculture) and its relationships to natural resources, processing, marketing, distribution, utilization (including nutrition), and trade. In addition, this award From April 3-13, 2016, Drs. Consuelo Carrillo and Hernando Duque, FADDL, attended the pre-COSALFA and COSALFA Meetings in Punta del Este, Uruguay, to meet with the FMD South American Commission for the fight and eradication of Foot and Mouth disease in the South American Continent..

participating-org.usg:office-name: Animal and Plant Health Inspection Service

owner-org.narrative: The federal government of the United States

description.narrative: The primary goal of U.S. assistance is to bolster Uruguayan engagement in international affairs, advance Uruguay's security sector reform, support military professionalization, and prepare the armed forces to counter emerging threats at home and abroad. Uruguay's commitment to international engagement makes it an important U.S. partner in global efforts to foster democracy, prosperity, and rule of law. Uruguay has a remarkable record as a contributor to peacekeeping operations and remains one of the top per capita police and troop contributors to United Nations peacekeeping missions. Military education and training is a key component of the U.S. government's commitment to enhancing security cooperation and strengthening Uruguay's national defense capabilities. This training also helps strengthen and maintain Uruguay's peacekeeping and disaster response capabilities.

usg:treasury-account.usg:main-account: Salaries and Expenses, Animal and Plant Health Inspection Service, Agriculture
